You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENABLEMENT SITES (MYTRAILHEAD)
Plan Your Enablement Site Solution

Excited to start delivering exceptional content to help employees and partners grow their expertise with your company's processes, policies, or requirements? Learn more about how an enablement site can help.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions
Example Use Cases for an Enablement Site
Adding an enablement site to your company’s resources can help support both internal and external users, whose success is critical for achieving your business goals.
Compare an Enablement Site and Trailhead
Trailhead is a free, online learning platform that’s a fun, engaging way for anyone to learn new skills and earn career credentials. Trailhead consists of a library of content that Salesforce has produced, intended to help anyone learn in-demand technical, business, and soft skills. With an enablement site, your company can implement that same platform on a separate, branded subdomain, and then deliver original content that fulfills your company’s learning requirements.
User Roles for an Enablement Site
Users in different roles engage with your enablement site throughout the content lifecycle. Depending on your company’s size and available talent, users can perform more than one role.
Content Lifecycle for Your Enablement Site
Creating and publishing content for your enablement site involves multiple disciplines that collaborate to plan, write, style, store, and release the content.
Supported Browsers and Apps for Enablement Sites
To help ensure that your company’s enablement experience is successful, learn about the different options for accessing content in the flow of work.
External Tools and Dependencies for an Enablement Site
To create and publish content, your company relies on a few resources outside of your enablement site.
Limits for Enablement Site Data
We restrict the size of certain data in your enablement site, such as an image file or the scope of trailmixes. As you add learning content to your enablement site, consider these limits to help you deliver a successful learning experience.
Sandbox Support for Enablement Sites
Enablement sites and associated tools, such as the Trail Tracker app, have limited support in a sandbox.

Let us know so we can improve!

title: Planning Your Enablement Site Solution
